_sText:
[Map preview (click me!)](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JBI6CQm1eqk "Map preview")

Hello there! during all this time I've been playing on my beloved "CS:S Training Center" map, but I got bored so I made a new one. The thing is that this time is made completely by me; without using a base that already exists.

One more time, the map consists on a training facility in which you will be able to have fun by testing your aiming skills through an specific route. The map basically implements several rooms with targets, and a long shooting range (this one is so boring to me that I didn't take care about placing a sniper rifle or showing it in the video).
I also didn't place flashbangs on the floor for the entries, unlike I did in my last map (this is because I sadly suffered from very slow frame rate).
There's a Buyzone so in fact you can use the weapons you want, although I highly recomment using the ones that are on the table (M4A1 and Sig Sauer P-228) since they got all the ammo you will need.

I have included the VMF. file so you can modify whatever you want (like the weapons for example).

So that's all folks; I hope you enjoy it as much as I did atleast and I'm sorry if wall of text.

*UPDATE! :

Added some HL2 guards around the map and AWP sniper rifle for the long shooting range
